column2: Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms
As a great King, we can declare a new empire, distinct from all those that came before.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has at least 3 kingdom titles which [Root.GetSheHe] completely controls
Every county and duchy in [This.GetFullName] is owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals)
!!!DEBUG MODE!!! No limit on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size is less than 120 (excluding vassal MR family palaces)
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will form a new empire by merging [Root.GetHerHis] completely-controlled kingdoms.
The new empire's coat of arms and map colour will be based on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title: the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Becomes de jure part of the new empire, and is then destroyed.
[This.GetName] becomes the traditional capital province of the new empire.
